spec:
When running the circleci build this error is happening:
Error calling workflow: 'build-test-publish'
Error calling job: 'publish-main-release'
Unclosed '<<' tag
('<<' must be escaped as '\<<' in config v2.1+)
  gh auth login --with-token <<< "$GITHUB_TOKEN"
commitMessage: Fix CircleCI config: Replace heredoc syntax with pipe for GitHub token authentication
